alert.note: Alert for Greene; Lawrence (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 2:47PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lawrence and southwestern Greene Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 247 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Billings, or 7 miles west of Republic, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Republic, Ash Grove, Halltown, Chesapeake and Bois D`arc. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 53 and 67. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
